body:
Description:

Performs and implements effective administration in Windows/Linux environments, installation/configuration back-ups and software updates. Have the ability to troubleshoot technical problems regarding servers, networking and infrastructure issues.
The System Administrator will work from our office in Timisoara. 

Mandatory Skills:

- General Windows 2003/2008, 
- Linux skills,
- AIX Administration skills,
- Server Installation and configuration for HMC Skills, 
- Virtualization on pSeries, xSeries, and zSeries, 
- WebSphere Application Server.

Nice to have skills:

- Application Configuration with WebSphere LDAP, 
- WebSphere Portal, 
- WebSphere Caching Proxy, 
- Tivoli products, 
- Lotus Domino,
- DB2.

Benefits:

- Motivating salary,
- Good working environment,
- Medical insurance,
- Annual team building,
- Trainings and certifications.
title: System Administrator - for Timisoara
